snippet.title: 'Glee' recap: Same Song, New (York) Verse
snippet.description: Glee finally, finally moves full-time to New York and while the action is minimal, the songs are superb, and the tone is pleasant, making for a better episode than we've seen from this show in... well, it's been a while.
